### #  # #   ### ### #  #  # #  #  #  ###  ##  #  #

#Category only allowed for is_potentially_communist_china
#Category visible when PRCkmt_infiltration focus is completed

#INFILTRATE_STATE_AI_WILL_DO <ID>
#INFILTRATE_JAP_STATE_AI_WILL_DO <ID>


@INFILTRATION_INF_EQ_COST = -500
@DAYS_REMOVE_INFILTRATE_STATE = 60
#Category only allowed for all china
#Category visible when PRC_coalition_government focus is completed for PRC
#Category visible when CHI_join_the_republican_government focus is completed for warlord

#Variables and flags and targets to know about
#Event target WTT_current_china_leader
#State variable for amount Support Points gained: state_political_support_value
#State flag: majority_political_platform_<TAG> for whoever has majority in the state
#Country flag: wtt_political_struggle for all countries involved in the struggle

#Variables:
#days_remove = global.days_add_support?1337 #DAYS_UNTIL_SUPPORRT_IN_STATE_IS_ADDED
#days_remove = global.days_remove_support?1337 #DAYS_UNTIL_REMOVE_SUPPORT


@PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR = 100
@PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2 = 20
@PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST = 20
@PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER = 499
@PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT = -500

PRC_dcat_frontline_behind_enemy_line_ai = {
	
	############################
	#			N.CHINA		   #
	############################
	#597-Shandong Peninsula
	
	PRC_dummy_decision_ai = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		visible = {
			NOT = {
				any_state = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					is_core_of = ROOT
					controller = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = { always = no }
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_in_states_ai = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		visible = {
			has_war_with = CHI
			any_state = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				any_state = {
					is_controlled_by = CHI
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 49 }
				}
				add = 1000
			}
		}
		
		cost = 0
		
		days_remove = 2
		days_re_enable = 30
		
		complete_effect = {
			division_template = {
				name = "Ren Min Qi Yi Jun"	
				regiments = { 
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 } 
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 } 
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 } 
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 } 
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 } 
				}
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "You Ji Qi Bing"	
				regiments = { 
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 } 
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 } 
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 } 
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 } 
				}
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Shan Di You Ji Dui"	
				regiments = { 
					mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 0 } 
					mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 1 } 
					mountaineers = { x = 1 y = 0 } 
					mountaineers = { x = 1 y = 1 } 
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_uprise_in_states_tt
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						tag = CHI
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
					controller = {
						tag = CHI}
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 49 }
				}
				ROOT = {
					set_state_controller = PREV
				}
				create_unit = { 
					division = "name = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" division_template = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" start_experience_factor = 0.25 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
					owner = ROOT
				}
				create_unit = { 
					division = "name = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" division_template = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" start_experience_factor = 0.25 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
					owner = ROOT
				}
				create_unit = { 
					division = "name = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" division_template = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" start_experience_factor = 0.25 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
					owner = ROOT
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 54 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" division_template = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 59 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" division_template = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" start_experience_factor = 0.45 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 64 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" division_template = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 69 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"Shan Di You Ji Dui\" division_template = \"Shan Di You Ji Dui\" start_experience_factor = 0.6 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 79 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"Shan Di You Ji Dui\" division_template = \"Shan Di You Ji Dui\" start_experience_factor = 0.65 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				CHI = {
					set_state_controller = PREV
				}
				set_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength = 0 }
				clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_setup_cell_597 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 597
		}
		
		visible = {
			597 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			597 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			597 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			597 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_597 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 597
		}
		
		visible = {
			597 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			597 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_597 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 597
		}
		
		visible = {
			597 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			597 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			597 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_597 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 597
		}
		
		visible = {
			597 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			597 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 597
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			597 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_597_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_597_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_597_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_597_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_597_598 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 598
		}
		
		visible = {
			597 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			598 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		available = {
			597 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				597 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				598 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				598 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				598 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_597_770 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 770
		}
		
		visible = {

				}
				770 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				770 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				770 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_597_743 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 743
		}
		
		visible = {
			597 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			743 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			597 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				597 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				743 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				743 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				743 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

				}
			}

			608 = {

				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_608 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 608
		}
		
		visible = {
			608 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				608 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			608 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_608 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 608
		}
		
		visible = {
			608 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			608 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_608_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_608_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				608 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			608 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_608 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 608
		}
		
		visible = {
			608 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			608 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 608
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				608 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_608_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_608_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				608 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			608 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_608_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_608_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_608_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_608_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

						}

				}

				615 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_608_614 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 614
		}
		
		visible = {
			608 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			614 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			608 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				608 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				614 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				608 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				614 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				608 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				614 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	#609-E.Hopeh
	
	PRC_setup_cell_609 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 609
		}
		
		visible = {
			609 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			609 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			609 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			609 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_609 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 609
		}
		
		visible = {
			609 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				609 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			609 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_609 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 609
		}
		
		visible = {
			609 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			609 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_609_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_609_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				609 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			609 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_609 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 609
		}
		
		visible = {
			609 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			609 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 609
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				609 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_609_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_609_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				609 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			609 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_609_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_609_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_609_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_609_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

				609 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				608 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	#610-Jehol
	
	PRC_setup_cell_610 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 610
		}
		
		visible = {
			610 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			610 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			610 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			610 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_610 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 610
		}
		
		visible = {
			610 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				610 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			610 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_610 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 610
		}
		
		visible = {
			610 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			610 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_610_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_610_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				610 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			610 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_610 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 610
		}
		
		visible = {
			610 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			610 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 610
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_610_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_610_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				610 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			610 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_610_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_610_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_610_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_610_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

		days_re_enable = 0

		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				610 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				716 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				610 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				716 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				610 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				716 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

				}
				611 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				610 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				611 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_610_609 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 609
		}
		
		visible = {
			610 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			609 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			610 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				610 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				609 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				610 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				609 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				610 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				609 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}

				}
			}

			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR

							tag = ROOT

					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}

			611 = {

				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_611 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 611
		}
		
		visible = {
			611 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				611 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			611 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_611 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 611
		}

			611 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

				}
			}
		}

			611 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_611_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_611_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				611 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			611 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_611 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 611
		}
		
		visible = {
			611 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			611 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 611
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				611 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_611_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_611_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				611 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			611 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_611_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_611_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_611_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_611_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				611 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				768 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				611 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				768 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

		}

	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_612 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 612
		}
		
		visible = {
			612 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				612 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			612 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_612 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 612
		}
		
		visible = {
			612 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			612 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_612_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_612_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				612 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			612 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_612 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 612
		}
		
		visible = {
			612 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			612 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 612
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				612 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_612_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_612_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				612 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			612 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_612_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_612_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_612_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_612_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_612_611 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 611
		}
		
		visible = {
			612 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			611 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		available = {
			612 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				612 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				611 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				612 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				611 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				612 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				611 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

				}

		}

				}
			}

							tag = ROOT

						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}

			614 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_614 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 614
		}
		
		visible = {
			614 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				614 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				614 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				614 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				614 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				614 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			614 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_614 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 614
		}

					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				614 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				614 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				614 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_614_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_614_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				614 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			614 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 614
		}
		
		visible = {
			614 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 614
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				614 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }

			}

				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				614 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}

			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_614_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_614_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				614 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			614 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_614_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_614_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_614_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {

											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_614_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}

		}

					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				608 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				614 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				608 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				614 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				608 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
