				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_615 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 615
		}
		
		visible = {
			615 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				615 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			615 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_615 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 615
		}
		
		visible = {
			615 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

				}
			}
		}

			615 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_615_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_615_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				615 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			615 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_615 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 615
		}
		
		visible = {
			615 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			615 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 615
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = {
					flag = PRC_ai_uprise_615_decision_cd_flag
					days < 30
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				615 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 615
							size > 10
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_615_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_615_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				615 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			615 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_615_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_615_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_615_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_615_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

			}
			
		}
		
		available = {
			615 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				615 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				621 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				615 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				621 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				615 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				621 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				615 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				611 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				615 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				611 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				615 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				611 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	#743-Tsingdao
	
	PRC_setup_cell_743 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 743
		}
		
		visible = {
			743 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			743 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST

		}

			743 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			743 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_743 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 743
		}
		
		visible = {
			743 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				743 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			743 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_743 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 743
		}
		
		visible = {
			743 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			743 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_743_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_743_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				743 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			743 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_743 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 743
		}
		
		visible = {
			743 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			743 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 743
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = {
					flag = PRC_ai_uprise_743_decision_cd_flag
					days < 30
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				743 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 743
							size > 10
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_743_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_743_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				743 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			743 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_743_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_743_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_743_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_743_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

			}

			743 = {

					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt

						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals

		}

			factor = 0

		days_re_enable = 0

		}

			OR = {
				743 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				597 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				743 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				597 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				743 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				597 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

		available = {
			768 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				768 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 768
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				768 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				768 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				768 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_768_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_768_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				768 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			768 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_768_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_768_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_768_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_768_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_768_612 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 612
		}
		
		visible = {
			768 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			612 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		available = {
			768 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				768 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				612 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				768 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				612 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				768 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				612 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	#770-Jinan
	
	PRC_setup_cell_770 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 770
		}
		
		visible = {
			770 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			770 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			770 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			770 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_770 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 770
		}
		
		visible = {
			770 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				770 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			770 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_770 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 770
		}
		
		visible = {
			770 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			770 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_770_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_770_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				770 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			770 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_770 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 770
		}
		
		visible = {
			770 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			770 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 770
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_uprise_770_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_uprise_770_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				770 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			770 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_770_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_770_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_770_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_770_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				770 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				614 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				770 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				614 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				770 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				614 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				597 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	#############################################
	#				WESTERN CHINA				#
	#############################################
	
	#283-Gansu
	
	PRC_setup_cell_283 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 283
		}
		
		visible = {
			283 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			283 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			283 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			283 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_283 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 283
		}
		
		visible = {
			283 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				283 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			283 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_283 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 283
		}
		
		visible = {
			283 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			283 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_283_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_283_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				283 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			283 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_283 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 283
		}
		
		visible = {
			283 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			283 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 283
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				283 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_283_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_283_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				283 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			283 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_283_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_283_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_283_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_283_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_283_622 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 622
		}
		
		visible = {
			283 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			622 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		available = {
			283 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				283 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				622 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				283 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				622 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				283 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				622 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				753 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				283 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				753 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_283_605 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 605
		}
		
		visible = {
			283 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			605 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			283 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				283 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				605 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				283 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				605 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				283 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				605 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	PRC_setup_cell_605 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 605
		}
		
		visible = {
			605 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			605 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			605 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			605 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_605 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 605
		}
		
		visible = {
			605 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				605 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			605 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_605 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 605
		}
		
		visible = {
			605 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			605 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_605_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_605_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				605 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			605 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_605 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 605
		}
		
		visible = {
			605 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			605 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 605
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				605 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_605_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_605_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				605 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			605 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_605_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_605_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_605_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_605_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				605 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				283 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				605 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				283 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	PRC_setup_cell_616 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 616
		}
		
		visible = {
			616 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			616 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			616 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			616 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_616 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 616
		}
		
		visible = {
			616 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				616 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			616 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_616 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 616
		}
		
		visible = {
			616 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			616 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_616_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_616_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				616 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			616 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_616 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 616
		}
		
		visible = {
			616 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			616 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 616
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				616 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_616_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_616_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				616 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			616 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_616_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_616_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_616_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_616_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_616_746 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {

		}

					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}

			616 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}

			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				616 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				746 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				616 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				746 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				616 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				746 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				616 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				755 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				616 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				755 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

				}
			}

							tag = ROOT

					}
				}
			}

				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_621 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 621
		}
		
		visible = {
			621 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				621 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			621 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}

					}
				}
			}
		}
