			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_621_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_621_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				621 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			621 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_621 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 621
		}
		
		visible = {
			621 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			621 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 621
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				621 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_621_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_621_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				621 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			621 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_621_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_621_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_621_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_621_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				616 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				621 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				616 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				621 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				616 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_622 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}

		highlight_states = {
			state = 622
		}

			622 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}

		}

			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				622 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				622 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				622 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				622 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				622 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			622 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}

				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				622 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				622 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}

			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_622_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_622_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				622 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			622 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			622 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_622_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_622_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_622_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_622_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_622_746 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 746
		}
		
		visible = {
			622 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			746 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		available = {
			622 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				622 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				746 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				622 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				746 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				622 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				746 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	PRC_setup_cell_744 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 744
		}
		
		visible = {
			744 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}

				}

				}

			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			744 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			744 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_744 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 744
		}
		
		visible = {
			744 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				744 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			744 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_744 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 744
		}
		
		visible = {
			744 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			744 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_744_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_744_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				744 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			744 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_744 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 744
		}
		
		visible = {
			744 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			744 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 744
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				744 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_744_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_744_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				744 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			744 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_744_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_744_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_744_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_744_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_744_771 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 771
		}
		
		visible = {
			744 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			771 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		available = {
			744 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				744 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				771 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				744 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				771 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				744 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				771 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				744 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				772 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				744 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				772 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				744 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				772 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	#746-Ordos
	
	PRC_setup_cell_746 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 746
		}
		
		visible = {
			746 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			746 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			746 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			746 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_746 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 746
		}
		
		visible = {
			746 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				746 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			746 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_746 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 746
		}
		
		visible = {
			746 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			746 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_746_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_746_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				746 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			746 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_746 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 746
		}
		
		visible = {
			746 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			746 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 746
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_746_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_746_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				746 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			746 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_746_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_746_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_746_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_746_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

			OR = {
				746 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				616 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				746 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				616 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				746 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				616 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

			746 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				746 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				615 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				746 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				615 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				746 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				615 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	#753-Guangyuan
	
	PRC_setup_cell_753 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 753
		}
		
		visible = {
			753 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			753 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			753 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			753 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_753 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 753
		}
		
		visible = {
			753 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				753 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			753 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_753 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 753
		}
		
		visible = {
			753 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			753 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_753_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_753_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				753 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			753 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_753 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 753
		}
		
		visible = {
			753 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			753 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 753
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				753 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_753_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_753_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				753 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			753 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_753_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_753_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_753_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_753_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

							}

					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

				283 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}

						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}

		visible = {
			753 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			751 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			753 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				753 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				751 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				753 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				751 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				753 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				751 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_753_605 = {

						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}

	#756-Jiuquan
	
	PRC_setup_cell_756 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 756
		}
		
		visible = {
			756 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			756 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			756 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			756 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_756 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 756
		}
		
		visible = {
			756 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				756 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			756 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_756 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 756
		}
		
		visible = {
			756 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			756 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_756_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_756_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				756 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			756 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_756 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 756
		}
		
		visible = {
			756 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			756 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 756
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				756 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_756_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_756_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				756 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			756 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_756_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_756_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_756_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_756_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_756_621 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 621
		}
		
		visible = {
			756 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			621 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			756 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				756 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				621 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				756 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				621 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				756 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				621 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

			}

				}

				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_772 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 772
		}
		
		visible = {
			772 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				772 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			772 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_772 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 772
		}
		
		visible = {
			772 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			772 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_772_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_772_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				772 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			772 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_772 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 772
		}
		
		visible = {
			772 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			772 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 772
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				772 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_772_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_772_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				772 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			772 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_772_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_772_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_772_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_772_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_772_605 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 605
		}
		
		visible = {
			772 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			605 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			772 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				772 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				605 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				772 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				605 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				772 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				605 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	#328-Kirin
	
	PRC_setup_cell_328 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 328
		}
		
		visible = {
			328 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			328 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			328 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			328 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_328 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 328
		}
		
		visible = {
			328 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				328 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			328 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_328 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 328
		}
		
		visible = {
			328 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			328 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_328_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_328_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				328 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			328 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_328 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 328
		}
		
		visible = {
			328 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			328 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 328
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				328 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_328_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_328_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				328 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			328 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_328_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_328_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_328_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_328_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
