	#775-Huaihua
	
	PRC_setup_cell_775 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 775
		}
		
		visible = {
			775 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			775 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			775 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			775 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_775 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 775
		}
		
		visible = {
			775 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				775 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			775 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_775 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 775
		}
		
		visible = {
			775 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			775 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_775_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_775_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				775 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			775 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_775 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 775
		}
		
		visible = {
			775 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			775 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 775
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				775 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_775_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_775_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				775 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			775 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_775_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_775_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_775_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_775_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				602 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				775 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				602 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				775 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				602 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_763 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 763
		}
		
		visible = {
			763 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				763 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			763 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_763 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 763
		}
		
		visible = {
			763 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			763 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_763_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_763_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				763 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			763 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_763 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 763
		}
		
		visible = {
			763 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			763 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 763
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				763 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_763_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_763_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				763 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			763 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_763_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_763_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_763_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_763_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_763_773 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 773
		}
		
		visible = {
			763 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			773 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			763 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				763 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				773 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				763 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				773 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				763 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				773 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				591 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				763 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				591 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				763 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				591 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	#773-Ganzhou

							tag = ROOT

					}

						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}

			773 = {

				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_773 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 773
		}
		
		visible = {
			773 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				773 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			773 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_773 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 773
		}
		
		visible = {
			773 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			773 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_773_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_773_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				773 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			773 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_773 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 773
		}
		
		visible = {
			773 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			773 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 773
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				773 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_773_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_773_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				773 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			773 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_773_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_773_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_773_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_773_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				602 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				773 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				602 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				773 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				602 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	#774-Ji'an
	
	PRC_setup_cell_774 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 774
		}
		
		visible = {
			774 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			774 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			774 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			774 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_774 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 774
		}
		
		visible = {
			774 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				774 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			774 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_774 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 774
		}
		
		visible = {
			774 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			774 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_774_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_774_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				774 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			774 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_774 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 774
		}
		
		visible = {
			774 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			774 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 774
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				774 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_774_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_774_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				774 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			774 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_774_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_774_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_774_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_774_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				774 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				620 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				774 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				620 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				774 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				620 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	PRC_setup_cell_601 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 601
		}
		
		visible = {
			601 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			601 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			601 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			601 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_601 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 601
		}
		
		visible = {
			601 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				601 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			601 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_601 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 601
		}
		
		visible = {
			601 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			601 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_601_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_601_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				601 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			601 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_601 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 601
		}
		
		visible = {
			601 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			601 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 601
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				601 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_601_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_601_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				601 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			601 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_601_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_601_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_601_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_601_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_601_604 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 604
		}
		
		visible = {
			601 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}

			}
		}
		
		available = {
			601 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				601 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				604 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				601 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				604 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				601 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				604 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	#604-Qinghai
	
	PRC_setup_cell_604 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 604
		}
		
		visible = {
			604 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			604 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			604 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			604 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_604 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 604
		}
		
		visible = {
			604 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				604 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			604 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_604 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 604
		}
		
		visible = {
			604 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			604 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_604_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_604_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				604 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			604 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_604 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 604
		}
		
		visible = {
			604 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			604 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 604
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_604_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_604_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				604 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			604 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_604_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_604_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_604_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_604_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

		visible = {
			604 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			754 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			604 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				604 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				754 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				604 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				754 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				604 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				754 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_604_601 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 601
		}
		
		visible = {
			604 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

					has_war_with = ROOT
				}

				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt

						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals

				604 = {

							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}

						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}

					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				604 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				601 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}

			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				604 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				601 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	#751-Ya'an
	
	PRC_setup_cell_751 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 751
		}
		
		visible = {
			751 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			751 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			751 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			751 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_751 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 751
		}
		
		visible = {
			751 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				751 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			751 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_751 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 751
		}
		
		visible = {
			751 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			751 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_751_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_751_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				751 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			751 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_751 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 751
		}
		
		visible = {
			751 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			751 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 751
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				751 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_751_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_751_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				751 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			751 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_751_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_751_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_751_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_751_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

			}

	PRC_relocate_751_753 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism

		}

					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}

			factor = 0
		}

		days_re_enable = 0

		modifier = {
		}

			OR = {
				751 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				753 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				751 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				753 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				751 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				753 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

		}

	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_752 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 752
		}
		
		visible = {
			752 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				752 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			752 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_752 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 752
		}
		
		visible = {
			752 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			752 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_752_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_752_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				752 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			752 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
