				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 752
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				752 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_752_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_752_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				752 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			752 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_752_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_752_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_752_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_752_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_752_601 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 601
		}
		
		visible = {
			752 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			601 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			752 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				752 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				601 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				752 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				601 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				752 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				601 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	#754-Guide
	
	PRC_setup_cell_754 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 754
		}
		
		visible = {
			754 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			754 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			754 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			754 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_754 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 754
		}
		
		visible = {
			754 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				754 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			754 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_754 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 754
		}
		
		visible = {
			754 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			754 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_754_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_754_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				754 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			754 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_754 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 754
		}
		
		visible = {
			754 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			754 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 754
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				754 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_754_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_754_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				754 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			754 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_754_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_754_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_754_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_754_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_754_601 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 601
		}
		
		visible = {
			754 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			601 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			754 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				754 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				601 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				754 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				601 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				754 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				601 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_754_755 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 755
		}
		
		visible = {
			754 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			755 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			754 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				754 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				755 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				754 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				755 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				754 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				755 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

	#755-Dulan
	
	PRC_setup_cell_755 = {
		icon = infiltrate_state
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 755
		}
		
		visible = {
			755 = { 
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_core_of = ROOT 
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			755 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			755 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			755 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_755 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 755
		}
		
		visible = {
			755 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				755 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			755 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_755 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 755
		}
		
		visible = {
			755 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			755 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement4_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_755_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_755_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				755 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			755 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_755 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 755
		}
		
		visible = {
			755 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			755 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 755
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				755 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_755_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_755_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				755 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			755 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_755_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_755_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_755_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_755_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				754 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_755_616 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 616
		}
		
		visible = {
			755 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			616 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			755 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				755 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				616 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				755 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				616 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				755 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				616 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}

				}
			}
		}

			764 = {
				controller = {

				}
			}
		}

			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR
		}

		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST

		}

			764 = {
				OR = {
					OWNER = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_together_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					controller = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			764 = {
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = 0 }
				set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_send_equipment_to_cell_764 = {
		available = { has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }}
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 764
		}
		
		visible = {
			764 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 1 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount < 11 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount > 29 }
				}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					owner = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @PRC_CELL_SEND_EQ_COST_TRIGGER_EFFECT
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				764 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			764 = {
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount value = 10 }
				add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_target_add_cell_strength_amount }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_add_cell_strength_tt
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sabotage_764 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 764
		}

						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					infrastructure > 4
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 4 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					infrastructure > 7
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 7 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					arms_factory > 1
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 10 }
				}
				factor = 10
			}
			
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_764_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_764_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				764 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			764 = {
				PRC_guerrilla_cell_sabotage_effect = yes
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_764 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 764
		}
		
		visible = {
			764 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_together_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			764 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement10_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 10
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_CELL_SET_UP_AI_FACTOR_2
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					controller = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = 764
							size < 1
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				764 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 30

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_764_decision_cd_flag
			set_country_flag = PRC_ai_sabotage_764_decision_cd_flag
			hidden_effect = {
				764 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_cell_strength_tt
			764 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					ROOT = {
						load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_764_40"
					}
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 40 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
							}
							ROOT = {
								load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_764_30"
							}
							set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 30 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
									}
									ROOT = {
										load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_764_20"
									}
									set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 20 }
									else = {
										ROOT = {
											load_oob = "PRC_guerrilla_764_10"
										}
										set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost value = 10 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_target_minus_cell_strength_amount value = PRC_state_cell_uprise_cost }
				custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_target_state_minus_cell_strength_tt
				set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					controller = { country_event = { id = prc.159 }}
					set_variable = { var = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_8days_cd_tt
		}
	}

			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_target_cell_strength_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				764 = {
					set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate value = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength }
					subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}
				751 = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
						}
						set_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						set_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						else = {
							add_to_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_temp_decision_target_state.PRC_guerrilla_cell_strength_to_relocate }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_relocate_cell_strength_tt
		}
	}
	
	PRC_relocate_764_752 = {
		icon = generic_nationalism
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 752
		}
		
		visible = {
			764 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell

					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			752 = {
				controller = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			764 = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = PRC_guerrilla_cell_requirement_tt
					check_variable = { 
						var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength 
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		days_remove = 8
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}

			OR = {
				764 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
						NOT = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
					}
				}
				752 = {
					OR = {
						OWNER = {
							NOT = {
								tag = ROOT
								has_war_together_with = ROOT
							}
						}
						controller = {
							NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				764 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_target_state
				}
				752 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_decision_relocate_target_state
				}

				764 = {

					clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
				}

KMT_dcat_west_expedition = {
	
	PRC_expedition_has_failed = {
		icon = generic_decision
		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = PRC_west_expedition
			has_war_with = XSM
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = failed_exp
			}
			has_global_flag = west_expedition_started
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = no_more_failed_event
			}
			NOT = {
				CHI = {
					has_completed_focus = KMT_north_west_insurgence
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = {
					flag = PRC_failed_exp_timer
					days > 35
				}
				add = 100
			}
			modifier = {
				XSM = { surrender_progress > 0.35 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}

		days_remove = 0
		days_re_enable = 0
		
		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 0
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_political_power = -25
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_war_support = -0.05
			white_peace = XSM
			set_country_flag = failed_exp
		}
	}
}

PRC_dcat_frontline_behind_enemy_line = {
	
	############################
	#			N.CHINA		   #
	############################
	#597-Shandong Peninsula
	
	PRC_dummy_decision = {
		icon = generic_decision
		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = PRC_front_line_behind_enemy_line
		}
		
		available = { always = no }
	}
	
	PRC_uprise_in_states = {
		icon = revolt
		visible = {
			has_war_with = CHI
			any_state = { has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				any_state = {
					is_controlled_by = CHI
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 49 }
				}
				add = 1000
			}
		}
		
		cost = 0
		
		days_remove = 2
		days_re_enable = 30
		
		complete_effect = {
			division_template = {
				name = "Ren Min Qi Yi Jun"	
				regiments = { 
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 } 
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 } 
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 } 
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 } 
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 } 
				}
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "You Ji Qi Bing"	
				regiments = { 
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 } 
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 } 
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 } 
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 } 
				}
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Shan Di You Ji Dui"	
				regiments = { 
					mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 0 } 
					mountaineers = { x = 0 y = 1 } 
					mountaineers = { x = 1 y = 0 } 
					mountaineers = { x = 1 y = 1 } 
				}
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_uprise_in_states_tt
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						tag = CHI
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
					controller = {
						tag = CHI}
					check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				ROOT = {
					set_state_controller = PREV
				}
				create_unit = { 
					division = "name = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" division_template = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" start_experience_factor = 0.25 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
					owner = ROOT
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 24 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" division_template = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" start_experience_factor = 0.25 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 29 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" division_template = \"Ren Min Qi Yi Jun\" start_experience_factor = 0.25 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 34 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" division_template = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 39 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" division_template = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" start_experience_factor = 0.45 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 44 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" division_template = \"You Ji Qi Bing\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 49 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"Shan Di You Ji Dui\" division_template = \"Shan Di You Ji Dui\" start_experience_factor = 0.6 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength > 54 }
					}
					create_unit = { 
						division = "name = \"Shan Di You Ji Dui\" division_template = \"Shan Di You Ji Dui\" start_experience_factor = 0.65 start_equipment_factor = 1" 
						owner = ROOT
					}
				}
				CHI = {
					set_state_controller = PREV
				}
				set_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength = 0 }
				clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
	}
}

@PRC_PACIFY_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR = 5
@PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_TRIGGER = 499
@PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT = -500

PRC_dcat_pacify_enemy_guerrilla_cell = {
	
	PRC_pacify_597 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 597
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 597
			597 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				owner = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			597 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
				ROOT = {
					OR = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = PREV
							size > 1
						}
						has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_PACIFY_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 5 }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 9 }
				}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				597 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			597 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					597 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					609 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_pacify_610 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 610
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 610
			610 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				owner = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			610 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
				ROOT = {
					OR = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = PREV
							size > 1
						}
						has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_PACIFY_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 5 }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 9 }
				}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				610 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			610 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				610 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					610 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_pacify_770 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 770
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 770
			770 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				owner = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			770 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
				ROOT = {
					OR = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = PREV
							size > 1
						}
						has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_PACIFY_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 5 }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 9 }
				}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				770 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			770 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				770 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					770 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_pacify_746 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 746
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 746
			746 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				owner = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			746 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
				ROOT = {
					OR = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = PREV
							size > 1
						}
						has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_PACIFY_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 5 }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 9 }
				}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				746 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			746 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				746 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					746 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				ROOT = {
					OR = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = PREV
							size > 1
						}
						has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_PACIFY_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				716 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 5 }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				716 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 9 }
				}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				716 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				716 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				716 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			716 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				716 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					716 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

			modifier = {
				598 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 5 }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				598 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 9 }
				}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				598 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				598 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				598 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			598 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				598 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					598 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				}

					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				765 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			765 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				765 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					765 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			593 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				593 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					593 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_pacify_594 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 594
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 594
			594 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				owner = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			594 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
				ROOT = {
					OR = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = PREV
							size > 1
						}
						has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_PACIFY_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				594 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 5 }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				594 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 9 }
				}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				594 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				594 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				594 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}

			594 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}

			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				594 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					594 = {

						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}

		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				747 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					747 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_pacify_748 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 748
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 748
			748 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				owner = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			748 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
				ROOT = {
					OR = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = PREV
							size > 1
						}
						has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_PACIFY_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				748 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 5 }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				748 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 9 }
				}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				748 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				748 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				748 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			748 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				748 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					748 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					601 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_pacify_604 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 604
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 604
			604 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				owner = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			604 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
				ROOT = {
					OR = {
						divisions_in_state = {
							state = PREV
							size > 1
						}
						has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_PACIFY_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 5 }
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 9 }
				}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 19 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 29 }
				}
				factor = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				604 = {
					check_variable = { PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength > 39 }
				}
				factor = 1000
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			604 = {
				NOT = {
					controller = { tag = ROOT }
					owner = { has_war_with = ROOT }
					has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_PACIFY_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				604 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_estimated_cell_str_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					604 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_state_estimated_cell_strength }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
						clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_cell_detected
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}

@PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_TRIGGER = 499
@PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT = 500
@PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR = 0
@PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_DECISIONS_COST = 75
@PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE = 20 #change the localization file as well

PRC_dcat_sweep_commie_cell = {
	PRC_sweep_597 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 597
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 597
			597 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			597 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
			}
			has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				tag = CHI
				add = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				add = 50
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			597 = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						controller = { tag = ROOT }
					}
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				597 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value value = @PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE }
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_chinese_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					597 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sweep_608 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 608
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 608
			608 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			608 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
			}
			has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				tag = CHI
				add = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				add = 50
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			608 = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						controller = { tag = ROOT }
					}
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				608 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value value = @PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE }
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_chinese_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					608 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

			has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				tag = CHI
				add = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				add = 50
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			770 = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						controller = { tag = ROOT }
					}
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				770 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value value = @PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE }
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_chinese_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					770 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		cost = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			756 = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						controller = { tag = ROOT }
					}
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				756 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value value = @PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE }
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_chinese_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					756 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				767 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value value = @PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE }
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_chinese_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					767 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
