				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					749 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sweep_765 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 765
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 765
			765 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			765 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
			}
			has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				tag = CHI
				add = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				add = 50
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			765 = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						controller = { tag = ROOT }
					}
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				765 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value value = @PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE }
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_chinese_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					765 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_sweep_599 = {
		icon = generic_scorched_earth
		
		highlight_states = {
			state = 599
		}
		
		visible = {
			controls_state = 599
			599 = {
				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			599 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
			}
			has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				tag = CHI
				add = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				add = 50
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			599 = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						controller = { tag = ROOT }
					}
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				599 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value value = @PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE }
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_chinese_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					599 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			763 = {
				controller = { tag = ROOT }
			}
			has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_TRIGGER }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_AI_BASE_FACTOR
			modifier = {
				tag = CHI
				add = 1000
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				add = 50
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			763 = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						controller = { tag = ROOT }
					}
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				763 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value value = @PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE }
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_chinese_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					763 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				NOT = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				add = 50
			}
		}

		days_remove = 20
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = @PRC_chinese_sweep_CELL_DECISIONS_COST
		
		modifier = {
		}
		
		cancel_trigger = {
			764 = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						controller = { tag = ROOT }
					}
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = @PRC_chinese_sweep_EQ_COST_EFFECT }
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				764 = {
					save_global_event_target_as = PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { var = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value value = @PRC_chinese_sweep_SUBTRACT_VALUE }
			custom_effect_tooltip = PRC_chinese_sweep_target_state_cell_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:PRC_temp_sweep_decision_target_state = {
							has_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					764 = {
						subtract_from_variable = { var = PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength value = PRC_chinese_sweep_subtract_value }
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = { PRC_state_guerrilla_cell_strength < 1 }
							}
							clr_state_flag = KMT_PRC_state_has_guerrilla_cell
						}
					}
					PRC = { country_event = { id = prc.160 }}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

PRC_dcat_initiatives_in_war_times = {
	
	PRC_increase_credibility_of_theory_dec = {
		icon = generic_decision
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_idea = PRC_maybe_theory_is_ok }
			has_completed_focus = PRC_increase_credibility_of_theory
		}
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_idea = PRC_maybe_theory_is_ok }
			surrender_progress < 0.3
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}

		days_remove = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			command_power > 4
			has_political_power > 14
		}
		
		custom_cost_text = PRC_cost_5_cp_and_15_pp

		cost = 0
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_ideas = PRC_maybe_theory_is_ok
		}
	}
	
	PRC_plan_drafting = {
		icon = generic_operation
		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = PRC_prepare_for_decisive_battle
			has_completed_focus = PRC_increase_credibility_of_theory
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = PRC_plan_drafting_cd_tt
				NOT = { has_active_mission = PRC_plan_drafting_cd }
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				has_war = yes
				add = 20
			}
		}

		days_remove = 10
		days_re_enable = 0
		
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			command_power > 49
		}
		
		custom_cost_text = PRC_cost_50_cp

		cost = 0
		
		modifier = {
			planning_speed = 10
			max_planning = 0.1
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = { 
				add_command_power = -50 
			}
			activate_mission = PRC_plan_drafting_cd
		}
	}
	
	PRC_plan_drafting_cd = {
		icon = generic_political_discourse
		
		allowed = { always = no }
		
		visible = {
		}
		
		available = {
			hidden_trigger = { always = no }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
		}

		days_re_enable = 0
		
		is_good = yes
		
		days_mission_timeout = 30
	}
}

PRC_dcat_chinese_civil_war_decide_capital = {
	
	PRC_decide_capital_stay = {
		icon = generic_political_discourse

		visible = {
			
		}
		
		available = {
			has_capitulated = no
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = no
				NOT = {
					any_state = {
						is_capital = no
						is_owned_by = ROOT
					}
					controls_state = 608
					controls_state = 613
				}
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = {
						flag = PRC_restart_CHI_war
						days > 300
					}
					CHI = {
						OR = {
							is_puppet_of = JAP
							is_in_faction_with = JAP
						}
					}
					CHI = {
						exists = no
					}
				}
				add = 10
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = prc_capital_decided
			set_country_flag = yanan_capital
			set_rule = {
				can_send_volunteers = yes
				can_puppet = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_decide_capital_beijing = {
		icon = generic_political_discourse

		visible = {
			
		}
		
		available = {
			has_capitulated = no
			controls_state = 608
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				is_historical_focus_on = yes
				add = 15
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = prc_capital_decided
			set_capital = 608
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_global_flag = KMT_use_postal_romanisation
				}
				set_province_name = { id = 9843 name = KMT_peking_rom }
				608 = { set_state_name = KMT_peking_rom }
				else = {
					set_province_name = { id = 9843 name = VICTORY_POINTS_9843 }
					608 = { set_state_name = STATE_608 }
				}
			}
			set_rule = {
				can_send_volunteers = yes
				can_puppet = yes
			}
			set_country_flag = peking_capital
		}
	}
	
	PRC_decide_capital_nanjing = {
		icon = generic_political_discourse

		visible = {
			
		}
		
		available = {
			has_capitulated = no
			controls_state = 613
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 10
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = prc_capital_decided
			set_capital = 613
			set_rule = {
				can_send_volunteers = yes
				can_puppet = yes
			}
			set_country_flag = nanking_capital
		}
	}
}

	PRC_uprising = {
		icon = generic_ignite_civil_war
	
		visible = {
			has_government = communism
		}
		
		available = {
			PRC_uprising_is_available = yes
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 60

		war_with_on_remove = CHI

		cost = 25

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0

			modifier = {
				#Block if still trying to kill JAP
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					has_war_with = JAP
					#Allow JAP, faction member or puppet to control 5 states at most before triggering civil war
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 5
						612 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						621 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						615 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						609 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						611 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						610 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						715 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						328 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						527 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						525 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						717 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						714 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						595 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						596 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						597 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						598 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						600 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						601 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						602 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						603 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						605 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						606 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						607 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						608 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						613 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						614 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						620 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						744 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
						746 = { CONTROLLER = { is_JAP_or_ally_of_JAP = yes } }
					}
				}
			}

			#Block if we get fewer than 3 troops
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 3
						283 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						597 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						598 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						607 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						608 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						614 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						615 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						621 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						746 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						744 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					}
				}
			}

			#The more troops, the bigger chance
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				283 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				597 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				598 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				607 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				608 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				614 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				615 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				621 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				744 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				746 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
			}

			#Sabotage is also nice
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				283 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_sabotage_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				597 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_sabotage_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				598 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_sabotage_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 3

			}

			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				random_country = {
					limit = {						
						tag = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader
					}

		}
	
		remove_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader
				}
				event_target:WTT_current_china_leader = { remove_from_faction = ROOT }
			}
			declare_war_on = { target = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader type = annex_everything }
			283 = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						CONTROLLER = { tag = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader }

				}
			}

	PRC_infiltrate_gansu = {
		
		icon = infiltrate_state
		visible = {
			has_government = communism
			has_completed_focus = PRCkmt_infiltration
			283 = {
				CONTROLLER = {
					tag = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {			
			NOT = { has_war_with = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader }
			PRC_is_not_infiltrating_a_state = yes
			has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > 499 }
			283 = {
				PRC_can_increase_infiltration_in_state = yes
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			state = 283
		}
		
		modifier = {
			command_power_gain = -0.2
		}
		
		#INFILTRATE_STATE_AI_WILL_DO 283
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 120
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_decision = PRC_uprising # don't throw away rifles if the uprising is going to start before you can finish this
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						283 = { has_state_flag = discovered_infiltration }
						PRC_all_nationalist_area_infiltration_discovered = no
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				283 = {
					has_state_flag = {
						flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@PREV
						value > 0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 50 #Really want to get to troop level
				283 = {
					has_state_flag = {
						flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@PREV
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}

		days_remove = @DAYS_REMOVE_INFILTRATE_STATE
		days_re_enable = 0
	
		cost = 10
	
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @INFILTRATION_INF_EQ_COST
			}			
			283 = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_state_flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT }
					}
					set_state_flag = {
						flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			283 = {
				PRCkmt_infiltration_succesful_show_uprising_effect = yes
				modify_state_flag = {
					flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

		remove_effect = {
			597 = {
				PRCkmt_infiltration_succesful_show_uprising_effect = yes
				modify_state_flag = {
					flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	PRC_infiltrate_jiangsu = {
		
		icon = infiltrate_state
		visible = {
			has_government = communism
			has_completed_focus = PRCkmt_infiltration
			598 = {
				CONTROLLER = {
					tag = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader
				}
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			NOT = { has_war_with = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader }
			PRC_is_not_infiltrating_a_state = yes
			has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > 499 }
			598 = {
				PRC_can_increase_infiltration_in_state = yes
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			state = 598
		}
		
		modifier = {
			command_power_gain = -0.2
		}
		
		#INFILTRATE_STATE_AI_WILL_DO 598
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_decision = PRC_uprising # don't throw away rifles if the uprising is going to start before you can finish this
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						598 = { has_state_flag = discovered_infiltration }
						PRC_all_nationalist_area_infiltration_discovered = no
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				598 = {
					has_state_flag = {
						flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@PREV
						value > 0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 50 #Really want to get to troop level
				598 = {
					has_state_flag = {
						flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@PREV
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}

		days_remove = @DAYS_REMOVE_INFILTRATE_STATE
		days_re_enable = 0
	
		cost = 10
	
		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @INFILTRATION_INF_EQ_COST
			}			
			598 = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_state_flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT }
					}
					set_state_flag = {
						flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			598 = {
				PRCkmt_infiltration_succesful_show_uprising_effect = yes
				modify_state_flag = {
					flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

 ##  #  # ### ###   ####  ##  ##   ##  #  #
#  # ## #  #   #       # #  # # # #  # ## #
#### # ##  #   #    #  # #### ##  #### # ##
#  # #  #  #   #    #  # #  # #   #  # #  #
#  # #  #  #  ###    ##  #  # #   #  # #  #

#Category only allowed for is_potentially_communist_china
#Category visible when PRCkmt_infiltration focus is completed
PRC_stir_anti_japanese_sentiment = {
	#609 #"east_hebei"
	#610 #"jehol"
	#611 #"south_chahar"
	#612 #"chahar"
	#714 #"heilungkiang"
	#715 #"liaoning"

	PRC_anti_japanese_uprising = {
		icon = revolt
		visible = {
			has_government = communism
		}
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = PRC_uprising_is_available
				any_state = {
					CONTROLLER = {
						OR = {
							original_tag = MAN
							original_tag = MEN
							original_tag = JAP
						}
					}
					PRC_is_infiltrated_by_PREV = yes
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 30

		modifier = {
			political_power_gain = -0.5
		}

		cost = 10
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0

			modifier = {
				add = 100
				PRC_ROOT_war_with_controller_of_anti_japan_infiltrated_state = yes				
			}

			#Block if not at least 2 troops and states are instant flipped
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
				NOT = { has_war_with = MEN }
				NOT = { has_war_with = MAN }
				NOT = {
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 2
						609 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						610 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						611 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						612 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						714 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
						715 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					}
				}
			}

			#The more troops, the more attractive the option to trigger
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 2
					609 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					610 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					611 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					612 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					714 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					715 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 3
					609 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					610 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					611 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					612 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					714 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					715 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 4
					609 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					610 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					611 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					612 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					714 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
					715 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_spawn_troops_in_state = yes }
				}
			}

			#Sabotage is also nice
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				609 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_sabotage_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				610 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_sabotage_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				611 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_sabotage_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				612 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_sabotage_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				714 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_sabotage_state = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 3
				715 = { PRCkmt_infiltration_uprising_PREV_will_sabotage_state = yes }
			}
		}


		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				MAN = { country_event = wtt_infiltration.10 }
				MEN = { country_event = wtt_infiltration.10 }
				JAP = { country_event = wtt_infiltration.10 }
			}
		}

		war_with_on_remove = JAP
		war_with_on_remove = MEN
		war_with_on_remove = MAN
	
		remove_effect = {
			declare_war_on = { target = JAP type = annex_everything }
			if = {
				limit = {
					MAN = { 
						exists = yes
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = { target = MAN type = annex_everything }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					MEN = { 
						exists = yes
					}
				}
				declare_war_on = { target = MEN type = annex_everything }
			}

			609 = { #east_hebei
				if = {
					limit = {
						CONTROLLER = {
							OR = {
								original_tag = MAN
								original_tag = MEN
								original_tag = JAP
							}
						}
						PRC_is_infiltrated_by_PREV = yes
					}
					PRC_execute_infiltration_effects_for_PREV = yes
				}
			}

			 
			610 = { #jehol
				if = {
					limit = {
						CONTROLLER = {
							OR = {
								original_tag = MAN
								original_tag = MEN
								original_tag = JAP
							}
						}
						PRC_is_infiltrated_by_PREV = yes
					}
					PRC_execute_infiltration_effects_for_PREV = yes
				}
			}

		icon = infiltrate_state

			has_government = communism
			has_completed_focus = PRC_stir_anti_japanese_sentiment

				CONTROLLER = {
					NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }

						original_tag = MAN

						original_tag = JAP
					}
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			state = 609
		}
		
		available = {
			PRC_is_not_infiltrating_a_state = yes
			has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > 499 }
			609 = {
				PRC_can_increase_infiltration_in_state = yes
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
			NOT = { has_war_with = MEN }
			NOT = { has_war_with = MAN }
		}
		
		modifier = {
			command_power_gain = -0.2
		}
	
	#INFILTRATE_JAP_STATE_AI_WILL_DO 609
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 50

			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				609 = { has_state_flag = discovered_infiltration }
				PRC_all_anti_japan_infiltration_discovered = no
			}
		}

		days_remove = @DAYS_REMOVE_INFILTRATE_STATE
		days_re_enable = 0

		cost = 25

		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = @INFILTRATION_INF_EQ_COST
			}			
			609 = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_state_flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT }
					}
					set_state_flag = {
						flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			609 = {
				PRCkmt_infiltration_succesful_show_uprising_effect = yes
				modify_state_flag = {
					flag = PRCkmt_infiltration_@ROOT
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

operations = {
	PRC_launch_100_regiments_campaign = {
		icon = generic_prepare_civil_war
		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = PRC_100_regiments_campaign
		}
		cost = 0
		fire_only_once = yes
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
		days_remove = 180

		modifier = {
			army_core_attack_factor = 0.25
		}
		complete_effect = {
			#WTT_TODO_CD: Script mission to take enemy state
		}
	}	
}

PRC_provoke_japan = {

	PRC_provoke_japan = {

		icon = generic_ignite_civil_war
		available = {
			not = {
				has_war_with = JAP
			}
			OR = {
				is_subject = no
				is_subject_of = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader
			}
			OR = {
				MAN = { 
					OR = {
						is_subject_of = JAP
						has_cosmetic_tag = MAN_kwantung_army 
					}
				}
				JAP = {
					owns_state = 525
					owns_state = 527
				}
			}
		}
		visible = {
			not = {
				has_war_with = JAP
			}
			OR = {
				MAN = { 
					OR = {
						is_subject_of = JAP 
						has_cosmetic_tag = MAN_kwantung_army 
					}
				}
				JAP = {
					owns_state = 525
					owns_state = 527
				}
			}
		}
		cost = 10
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
		fixed_random_seed = no
		days_re_enable = 90
		complete_effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						MAN = {
							is_subject_of = JAP
						}
						JAP = {
							owns_state = 525
							owns_state = 527
						}
					}
				}
				JAP = {
					random_list = {
						25 = { country_event = wtt_prc.21 }# sabotage - military
						25 = { country_event = wtt_prc.22 }# sabotage - civilian
						25 = { country_event = wtt_prc.23 }# sabotage - infrastructure
						25 = { country_event = wtt_prc.24 }# patrol ambushed
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					MAN = {
						has_cosmetic_tag = MAN_kwantung_army 
					}
				}
				MAN = {
					random_list = {
						25 = { country_event = wtt_prc.21 }# sabotage - military
						25 = { country_event = wtt_prc.22 }# sabotage - civilian
						25 = { country_event = wtt_prc.23 }# sabotage - infrastructure
						25 = { country_event = wtt_prc.24 }# patrol ambushed
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

political_actions = {
	PRC_return_manchuria_communist = {

		available = {
			event_target:WTT_communist_china = {
				tag = ROOT
			}
			JAP = {
				has_government = communism
				not = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				OR = {
					controls_state = 610
					controls_state = 716
					controls_state = 745
					controls_state = 328
					controls_state = 717
					controls_state = 714
					controls_state = 715
					controls_state = 761
					controls_state = 611
					controls_state = 612
					controls_state = 609
				}
			}
			MAN = {
				OR = {
					exists = no
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {

						type = puppet_wargoal_focus
						target = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}

	COM_is_GER_recall_von_falkenhausen_dec = {

		icon = generic_army_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = GER
		}
		
		visible = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = GER_CHI_continue_military_cooperation_with_china }
		}
		
		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = GER_cant_recall_falkenhausen_FLAG
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 25

		complete_effect = {
			CHI = {
				add_political_power = -50
				add_stability = -0.01
				add_war_support = -0.01
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = general_staff_ger
					}
					
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = general_staff_ger
						add_idea = general_staff_domestic
					}
				}
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = CHI_alexander_von_falkenhausen
					}
					
					remove_ideas = CHI_alexander_von_falkenhausen
				}
				
				country_event = umc_is_ger.20
			}
		
			set_global_flag = COM_von_falkenhausen_recalled_FLAG
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
			
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				
				any_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
					has_war_with = CHI
				}
			}
			
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				
				has_completed_focus = GER_JAP_the_common_goal_unites_us
			}
		}
	}

				ITA = { has_capitulated = no }
			}
		}

	form_greater_german_reich = {

		icon = generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = GER
			has_dlc = "Waking the Tiger"
		}

		available = {
			is_subject = no
		
			OR = {
				GER = { controls_state = 219 }
				any_other_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
					controls_state = 219
				}
			}
			OR = {
				GER = { controls_state = 195 }
				any_other_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
					controls_state = 195
				}
			}
			OR = {
				GER = { controls_state = 195 }
				any_other_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
					controls_state = 195
				}
			}
			OR = {
				GER = { controls_state = 217 }
				any_other_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
					controls_state = 217
				}
			}		
		}

		visible = {
			AND = {
				original_tag = GER
				has_government = fascism
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes name = "Adolf Hitler" }
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = form_greater_german_reich_flag }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_war_with = FRA
					FRA = { has_capitulated = yes }
				}
				AND = {
					owns_state = 16
					has_full_control_of_state = 16
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_political_power = 300
			
			add_stability = 0.025
			add_war_support = 0.025
		
			set_cosmetic_tag = GER_greater_german_reich

			hidden_effect = {
				set_global_flag = form_greater_german_reich_flag
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
	}

	# THIS will start the Border War - activated via event
	JAP_marco_polo_bridge_incident_dec = {
		icon = border_war
		
		allowed = {
			original_tag = JAP
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = { has_war_with = CHI }
			NOT = {
				has_full_control_of_state = 608
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_completed_focus = JAP_CHI_marco_polo_bridge_incident
		
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = CHI
				is_in_faction_with = CHI
			}
			608 = {
				is_controlled_by = CHI
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			state = 608
		}
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		cost = 0
		war_with_on_remove = CHI
		
		complete_effect = {
			609 = {
				save_event_target_as = JAP_CHI_attacker_state
				set_state_flag = border_incident_active
			}
			608 = {
				save_event_target_as = JAP_CHI_defender_state
				set_state_flag = border_incident_active
			}

			start_border_war = {
				change_state_after_war = no
				attacker = {
					state = 609
					num_provinces = 4
					on_win = umc_jap.210
					on_cancel = umc_jap.211
					on_lose = umc_jap.212
				}
				
				defender = {
					state = 608
					num_provinces = 4
					on_win = umc_jap.215
					on_cancel = umc_jap.216
					on_lose = umc_jap.217
				}
			}

			activate_targeted_decision = { target = CHI decision = JAP_border_conflict_time_until_cancelled_CHI }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}
	
	#Mission for attacker to win border war against FROM in X days
	JAP_border_conflict_time_until_cancelled_CHI = {

		icon = border_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		available = {
			609 = { has_border_war = no }
			608 = { has_border_war = no }
		}
		
		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 609
				state = 608
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 150
		is_good = no

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			
		}

		timeout_effect = {
			cancel_border_war = {
				defender = 608
				attacker = 609
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = CHI decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_CHI }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = JAP decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_CHI }
			}
		}
	}

	#Decision to escalate conflict further
	JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_CHI = {

		icon = decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = { always = no } 

		visible = {
			has_border_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 609
				state = 608
			}
		}

		cost = 200

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				set_border_war_data = {
					attacker = 609
					defender = 608
					defender_modifier = 0.15
					combat_width = 100
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_border_war_data = {
					attacker = 609
					defender = 608
					attacker_modifier = 0.15
					combat_width = 100
				}
			}
			CHI = {
				set_country_flag = {
					flag = WTT_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_cooldown_@ROOT
					days = 60
					value = 1
				}
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = JAP decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_CHI }
			}
			set_country_flag = {
				flag = WTT_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_cooldown_@CHI
				days = 60
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = in_60_days
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = CHI decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_CHI }
		}
	}

	#Decision to escalate conflict further
	JAP_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_CHI = {

		icon = decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = WTT_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_cooldown_@FROM }
			has_border_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 609
				state = 608
			}
		}

		cost = 150

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		war_with_target_on_remove = yes

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				609 = { save_event_target_as = their_state }
				608 = { save_event_target_as = our_state }
			}
			else = {
				609 = { save_event_target_as = our_state }
				608 = { save_event_target_as = their_state }
			}
			CHI = {
				country_event = { id = japan_border_conflict.5 }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_targeted_decision = { target = JAP decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_CHI }
				}
		 	}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			cancel_border_war = {
				dont_fire_events = yes
				defender = 608
				attacker = 609
			}
			declare_war_on = { target = FROM type = annex_everything }
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				608 = {
					clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
				}
				609 = {
					clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
				}
				
			}
			else = {
				FROM = {
					608 = {
						clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
					}
					609 = {
						clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#Decision to back down from conflict
	JAP_border_conflict_back_out_of_conflict_CHI = {

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		visible = {
			has_border_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 609
				state = 608
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				finalize_border_war = {
					attacker_win = yes
					attacker = 609
					defender = 608
				}
			}
			else = {
				finalize_border_war = {
					attacker = 609
					defender = 608
					defender_win = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

				is_in_faction_with = SHX
			}

				is_controlled_by = SHX
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_completed_focus = JAP_continental_situation

			NOT = {
				has_war_with = SHX
				is_in_faction_with = SHX
			}
			611 = {
				any_neighbor_state = {
					is_controlled_by = SHX
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			state = 621
		}

		cost = 50
		days_remove = 30
		war_with_on_remove = SHX
		
		complete_effect = {
			611 = {
				save_event_target_as = JAP_SHX_attacker_state
				set_state_flag = border_incident_active
			}
			621 = {
				save_event_target_as = JAP_SHX_defender_state
				set_state_flag = border_incident_active
			}
			SHX = {
				country_event = { id = japan_border_conflict.1 days = 1 }
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = JAP decision = JAP_border_conflict_warning_SHX }
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = SHX decision = JAP_border_incident_forgotten_SHX }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = SHX decision = JAP_escalate_incident_to_border_conflict_SHX }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 500
		}
	}

		}
	}

	#Decision to escalate incident on border with SHX to border conflict
	JAP_escalate_incident_to_border_conflict_SHX = {

		icon = border_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		available = {
			611 = {
				OR = {
					is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
					CONTROLLER = {
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
					CONTROLLER = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 611
				state = 621			
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 10
			modifier = { 
				has_war = no
				factor = 10
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = SHX decision = JAP_border_incident_forgotten_SHX }
			start_border_war = {
				change_state_after_war = no
				attacker = {
					state = 611
					num_provinces = 4
					on_win = japan_border_conflict.2
					on_lose = japan_border_conflict.3
					on_cancel = japan_border_conflict.4
				}
				
				defender = {
					state = 621
					num_provinces = 4
					on_win = japan_border_conflict.3
					on_lose = japan_border_conflict.2
					on_cancel = japan_border_conflict.4
				}
			}
			SHX = {
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = JAP decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_SHX }
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = JAP decision = JAP_border_conflict_time_until_cancelled_SHX }
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = SHX decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_SHX }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = SHX decision = JAP_border_conflict_time_until_cancelled_SHX }
		}
	}
	
	#Mission for attacker to win border war against FROM in X days
	JAP_border_conflict_time_until_cancelled_SHX = {

		icon = border_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		available = {
			611 = { has_border_war = no }
			621 = { has_border_war = no }
		}
		
		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 611
				state = 621
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 90
		is_good = no

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			MEN = { transfer_state = 621 }
			MEN = { add_war_support = 0.25 }
		}

		timeout_effect = {
			cancel_border_war = {
				defender = 611
				attacker = 621
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = SHX decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_SHX }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = JAP decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_SHX }
			}
		}
	}

	#Decision to escalate conflict further
	JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_SHX = {

		icon = decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		visible = {
			has_border_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 611
				state = 621
			}
		}

		cost = 200

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				set_border_war_data = {
					attacker = 611
					defender = 621
					defender_modifier = 0.15
					combat_width = 100
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_border_war_data = {
					attacker = 611
					defender = 621
					attacker_modifier = 0.15
					combat_width = 100
				}
			}
			SHX = {
				set_country_flag = {
					flag = WTT_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_cooldown_@ROOT
					days = 60
					value = 1
				}
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = JAP decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_SHX }
			}
			set_country_flag = {
				flag = WTT_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_cooldown_@SHX
				days = 60
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = in_60_days
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = SHX decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_SHX }
		}
	}

	#Decision to escalate conflict further
	JAP_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_SHX = {

		icon = decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = WTT_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_cooldown_@FROM }
			has_border_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 611
				state = 621
			}
		}

		cost = 150

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}

		days_remove = 15

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		war_with_target_on_remove = yes

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				611 = { save_event_target_as = their_state }
				621 = { save_event_target_as = our_state }
			}
			else = {
				611 = { save_event_target_as = our_state }
				621 = { save_event_target_as = their_state }
			}
			SHX = {
				country_event = { id = japan_border_conflict.5 }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_targeted_decision = { target = JAP decision = JAP_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_SHX }
				}
		 	}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			cancel_border_war = {
				dont_fire_events = yes
				defender = 621
				attacker = 611
			}
			declare_war_on = { target = FROM type = annex_everything }
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				611 = {
					clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
				}
				621 = {
					clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
				}
				
			}
			else = {
				FROM = {
					611 = {
						clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
					}
					621 = {
						clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#Decision to back down from conflict
	JAP_border_conflict_back_out_of_conflict_SHX = {

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		visible = {
			has_border_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 611
				state = 621
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				finalize_border_war = {
					attacker_win = yes
					attacker = 611
					defender = 621
				}
			}
			else = {
				finalize_border_war = {
					attacker = 611
					defender = 621
					defender_win = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	COM_is_JAP_put_the_manchus_to_their_place_dec = {

		icon = generic_operation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = JAP
		}
		
		visible = {
			MAN = {
				is_subject_of = JAP
				has_completed_focus = MAN_restore_the_might_of_the_qing_dynasty
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			MAN = {
				is_subject_of = JAP
				has_government = neutrality
				has_completed_focus = MAN_seize_the_power_in_manchuria
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 150

		complete_effect = {
			add_threat = 5
			
			add_stability = -0.15
			add_war_support = -0.05
			
			end_puppet = MAN
			
			hidden_effect = {
				MAN = {
					leave_faction = yes
				}
			}
			
			declare_war_on = {
				target = MAN
				type = annex_everything
			}
			
			MAN = {
				add_political_power = 150
				add_stability = -0.05
				add_war_support = 0.1
			
				start_civil_war = {
					ideology = fascism
					size = 0.15
					capital = 716
					states = { 
						716 874 610
					}
					keep_unit_leaders_trigger = {
						always = yes
					}
				}
			}
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = COM_is_JAP_put_the_manchus_to_their_place_dec_EXPL
			
			hidden_effect = {
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						original_tag = MAN
						NOT = { tag = MAN }
					}
					save_event_target_as = MAN_puppet
				}
				
				set_autonomy = {
					target = event_target:MAN_puppet
					autonomy_state = autonomy_wtt_imperial_protectorate
				}
				
				event_target:MAN_puppet = {
					kill_country_leader = yes
					
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Kenkichi Ueda"
						desc = "umc_kenkichi_ueda_desc"
						picture = "portrait_man_kenkichi_ueda.dds"
						expire = "1962.1.1"
						ideology = fascism_ideology
						traits = {
							MAN_Ueda_T1 MAN_Ueda_T2 MAN_Ueda_T3 MAN_Ueda_T4 MAN_Ueda_T5 MAN_Ueda_T6
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			### REVISIT - CHI and PRC should be able to do something
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	COM_is_JAP_propose_surrender_to_CHI_dec = {

		icon = generic_decision

		allowed = {
			original_tag = JAP
		}
		
		visible = {
			has_war_with = CHI
			
			OR = {
				has_government = fascism
				has_government = neutrality
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			has_war_with = CHI
		
			NOT = {
				any_state = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = CHI
						is_core_of = MAN
						is_core_of = KOR
						is_core_of = SOV
					}
					
					NOT = {
						state = 524
					}
					
					UMC_is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_puppet_st = yes
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = no
		days_re_enable = 120

		cost = 0

		complete_effect = {
			CHI = {
				country_event = umc_jap.300
			}
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = UMC_accept_offer_tt
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = -250
				add_stability = -0.25
				add_war_support = -0.35
				
				release = KOR 
				
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = JAP_defeat_in_china_I
					days = 730
				}
				
				CHI = {
					add_political_power = 150
					add_stability = 0.025
					add_war_support = 0.1
					
					custom_effect_tooltip = COM_is_JAP_propose_surrender_to_CHI_dec_EXPL
					
					white_peace = JAP
					
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = JAP_CHI_MAN_japanese_reparations_I
						days = 365
					}
				}
				
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								tag = PRC
								has_war_with = JAP
							}
						
							AND = {
								is_in_faction_with = CHI
								has_war_with = JAP
							}
						}
					}
				
					white_peace = JAP
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

		icon = generic_decision

		allowed = {
			original_tag = JAP
		}
		
		visible = {

			OR = {
				has_government = fascism

			}
		}

			has_war_with = MAN
		
			NOT = {
				any_state = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = CHI
						is_core_of = MAN
						is_core_of = KOR
						is_core_of = SOV
					}
					
					NOT = {
						state = 524
					}
					
					UMC_is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_puppet_st = yes
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = no
		days_re_enable = 120

		cost = 0

		complete_effect = {
			MAN = {
				country_event = umc_jap.310
			}
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = UMC_accept_offer_tt
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = -250
				add_stability = -0.25
				add_war_support = -0.35
				
				release = KOR
				
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = JAP_defeat_in_china_I
					days = 730
				}
				
				MAN = {
					add_political_power = 150
					add_stability = 0.025
					add_war_support = 0.1
				
					if = {
						limit = {
							JAP = {
								owns_state = 609
							}
						}
						transfer_state = 609
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							JAP = {
								owns_state = 745
							}
						}
						transfer_state = 745
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							JAP = {
								owns_state = 524
							}
						}
						transfer_state = 524
					}
					
					white_peace = JAP 
					
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = JAP_CHI_MAN_japanese_reparations_I
						days = 365
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	COM_is_JAP_propose_surrender_to_SOV_dec = {

		icon = generic_decision

		allowed = {
			original_tag = JAP
		}
		
		visible = {
			has_war_with = SOV
			
			OR = {
				has_government = fascism
				has_government = neutrality
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			has_war_with = SOV
		
			NOT = {
				any_state = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = CHI
						is_core_of = MAN
						is_core_of = KOR
						is_core_of = SOV
					}
					
					NOT = {
						state = 524
					}
					
					UMC_is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_puppet_st = yes
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = no
		days_re_enable = 120

		cost = 0

		complete_effect = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = umc_jap.320
			}
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = UMC_accept_offer_tt
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = -250
				add_stability = -0.25
				add_war_support = -0.35
				
				release = KOR 
				
				SOV = {
					add_political_power = 150
					add_stability = 0.025
					add_war_support = 0.1
					
					custom_effect_tooltip = COM_is_JAP_propose_surrender_to_SOV_dec_EXPL
					
					white_peace = JAP
				}
				
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								tag = CHI
								has_war_with = JAP
							}
							AND = {
								tag = PRC
								has_war_with = JAP
							}
						
							AND = {
								is_in_faction_with = SOV
								has_war_with = JAP
							}
						}
					}
					
					white_peace = JAP
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

					is_core_of = SOV
				}

					state = 524
				}

			}
		}

			OR = {
				has_war_with = CHI
				has_war_with = MAN
				has_war_with = SOV
			}
		
			NOT = {
				any_state = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = CHI
						is_core_of = MAN
						is_core_of = KOR
						is_core_of = SOV
					}
					
					NOT = {
						state = 524
					}
					
					UMC_is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_puppet_st = yes
				}
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 90

			add_stability = -0.05
			add_war_support = -0.025

				ideology = fascism
				popularity = -0.05
			}

				ideology = neutrality
				popularity = -0.05
			}
		}

			add_stability = 0.01
			add_war_support = 0.015
		}
	}
	
	
	
	##### JCD - JAPAN
	JCD_unrest_on_the_home_islands_dec = {

		icon = generic_civil_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = JAP
		}

		available = {
			has_completed_focus = JCD_launch_the_uprising 
		}

		activation = {
			has_completed_focus = JCD_begin_the_internal_struggle
			
			OR = {
				has_idea = JCD_new_ways_I1
				has_idea = JCD_new_ways_I2
				has_idea = JCD_new_ways_I3
				has_idea = JCD_new_ways_I4
				has_idea = JCD_new_ways_I5
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 15

		fixed_random_seed = no

		fire_only_once = no

		is_good = no

		timeout_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = JCD_send_the_stubborn_to_manchuria }
				}
				
				random_list = {
					15 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.250
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							add_stability = -0.025
							
							add_manpower = -5000
							
							add_popularity = {
								ideology = fascism
								popularity = 0.04
							}
						}
					}
					15 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.251
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							add_political_power = 25
						
							add_stability = -0.025
							add_war_support = 0.01
							
							add_manpower = -5000
							
							add_popularity = {
								ideology = fascism
								popularity = -0.04
							}
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.252
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							add_political_power = -25
						
							add_popularity = {
								ideology = democratic
								popularity = -0.02
							}
							add_popularity = {
								ideology = communism
								popularity = -0.02
							}
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.253
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							add_political_power = 15
							add_stability = 0.01
						
							custom_effect_tooltip = JCD_unrest_on_the_home_islands_dec_EXPL1
						
							hidden_effect = {
								random_unit_leader = {
									limit = {
										has_trait = JAP_samurai_lineage
									}
									remove_unit_leader_trait = JAP_samurai_lineage
								}
							}
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.254
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							add_political_power = 15
							add_war_support = 0.01
						
							custom_effect_tooltip = JCD_unrest_on_the_home_islands_dec_EXPL2
						
							hidden_effect = {
								random_unit_leader = {
									limit = {
										NOT = { has_trait = JAP_communist_sympathizer }
										NOT = { has_trait = JAP_samurai_lineage }
									}
									add_unit_leader_trait = JAP_communist_sympathizer
								}
							}
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.255
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							random_owned_controlled_state = {
								limit = {
									is_in_home_area = yes
									industrial_complex > 1
								}
								remove_building = {
									type = industrial_complex
									level = 1
								}
								damage_building = {
									type = industrial_complex
									damage = 2
								}
							}
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.256
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							random_owned_controlled_state = {
								limit = {
									is_in_home_area = yes
									arms_factory > 1
								}
								remove_building = {
									type = arms_factory
									level = 1
								}
								damage_building = {
									type = arms_factory
									damage = 2
								}
							}
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.257
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							random_owned_controlled_state = {
								limit = {
									is_in_home_area = yes
									infrastructure > 0
								}
								remove_building = {
									type = infrastructure
									level = 1
								}
								damage_building = {
									type = infrastructure
									damage = 2
								}
							}
						}
					}
					10 = {
					
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				random_list = {
					15 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.250
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							add_stability = -0.025
							
							add_manpower = -5000
							
							add_popularity = {
								ideology = fascism
								popularity = 0.04
							}
						}
					}
					15 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.251
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							add_political_power = 25
						
							add_stability = -0.025
							add_war_support = 0.01
							
							add_manpower = -5000
							
							add_popularity = {
								ideology = fascism
								popularity = -0.04
							}
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = umc_jcd.252
						
						effect_tooltip = {
							add_political_power = -25
						
							add_popularity = {
								ideology = democratic
								popularity = -0.02
							}
							add_popularity = {
								ideology = communism
								popularity = -0.02
							}
						}
					}
					10 = {

							add_political_power = 15
							add_war_support = 0.01
						
							custom_effect_tooltip = JCD_unrest_on_the_home_islands_dec_EXPL2
						
							hidden_effect = {
								random_unit_leader = {
									limit = {
										NOT = { has_trait = JAP_communist_sympathizer }
										NOT = { has_trait = JAP_samurai_lineage }
									}

					}
					10 = {

							random_owned_controlled_state = {
								limit = {
									is_in_home_area = yes

									level = 1
								}
								damage_building = {
									type = industrial_complex
									damage = 2

						}
					}
					15 = {

	##### MAN

				has_completed_focus = MAN_the_two_emperors
			}
		}

		days_remove = 120

	##### MAW
	COM_is_MAW_push_in_chahar_dec = {

		icon = border_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = MAN
		}
		
		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = MAW_revive_the_fengtian_clique
		
			NOT = {
				has_full_control_of_state = 611
			}
			
			MEN = {
				exists = yes
			}
		}
		
		available = {
			has_completed_focus = MAW_push_in_chahar
		}

		highlight_states = {
			state = 611
		}
		
		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 30
		war_with_on_remove = MEN
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_war_support = 0.01
		
			880 = {
				save_event_target_as = MAN_MEN_attacker_state
				set_state_flag = border_incident_active
			}
			611 = {
				save_event_target_as = MAN_MEN_defender_state
				set_state_flag = border_incident_active
			}
			
			CHI = {
				country_event = { id = umc_is_man.10 days = 1 }
			}
		
			MEN = {
				add_stability = -0.025
				add_war_support = 0.01
			
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = MAN decision = MAN_border_conflict_warning_MEN }
			}
		}
		
		remove_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = MEN decision = MAN_border_incident_forgotten_MEN }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = MEN decision = MAN_escalate_incident_to_border_conflict_MEN }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}
	
	#Mission for defender warning that a conflict with FROM is coming
	MEN_border_conflict_warning_MAN = {

		icon = border_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		available = {
			hidden_trigger = { always = no }
		}

		war_with_target_on_timeout = yes
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 30

		fire_only_once = yes

		is_good = no
		
		timeout_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = escalation_possible_tooltip_for_defender
			custom_effect_tooltip = effects_if_border_conflict_is_lost
			
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = MAN decision = MAN_border_conflict_warning_MEN }
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = MAN decision = MAN_border_conflict_escalation_warning_MEN }
			}
		}
	}

	#Mission for defender warning FROM can escalate to war at any point is coming
	MAN_border_conflict_escalation_warning_MEN = {

		icon = border_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

	#Mission for attacker to escalate or incident is forgotten
	MAN_border_incident_forgotten_MEN = {

		icon = border_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		available = {
			#var:ROOT.defender_state_vs_@FROM = {
			#	has_ROOT_at_least_1_div_in_current_state_scope = yes
			#}
			hidden_trigger = { always = no }
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 880
				state = 611
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 30

		fire_only_once = yes

		is_good = no
		
		timeout_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = MEN decision = MAN_escalate_incident_to_border_conflict_MEN }
			add_political_power = -100
			add_war_support = -0.05 #Shameful Display
			hidden_effect = {
				MEN = { remove_targeted_decision = { target = MAN decision = MAN_border_conflict_escalation_warning_MEN } }
				MEN = {
					611 = {
						clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
					}
					880 = {
						clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}
	}

	#Decision to escalate incident on border with MEN to border conflict
	MAN_escalate_incident_to_border_conflict_MEN = {

		icon = border_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		available = {
			880 = {
				OR = {
					is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
					CONTROLLER = {
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
					CONTROLLER = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			divisions_in_border_state = {
				state = 880
				border_state = 611
				size > 0
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 880
				state = 611			
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = MEN decision = MAN_border_incident_forgotten_MEN }
			start_border_war = {
				change_state_after_war = no
				attacker = {
					state = 880
					num_provinces = 4
					on_win = umc_is_man.11
					on_cancel = umc_is_man.12
					on_lose = umc_is_man.13
				}
				
				defender = {
					state = 611
					num_provinces = 4
					on_win = umc_is_man.14
					on_cancel = umc_is_man.16
					on_lose = umc_is_man.18
				}
			}
			MEN = {
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = MAN decision = MAN_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_MEN }
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = MAN decision = MAN_border_conflict_time_until_cancelled_MEN }
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = MEN decision = MAN_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_MEN }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = MEN decision = MAN_border_conflict_time_until_cancelled_MEN }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 10
			modifier = { 
				has_war = no
				factor = 10
			}
		}
	}
	
	#Mission for attacker to win border war against FROM in X days
	MAN_border_conflict_time_until_cancelled_MEN = {

		icon = border_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		available = {
			880 = { has_border_war = no }
			611 = { has_border_war = no }
		}
		
		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 880
				state = 611
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 150
		is_good = no

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			
		}

		timeout_effect = {
			cancel_border_war = {
				defender = 611
				attacker = 880
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = MEN decision = MAN_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_MEN }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = MAN decision = MAN_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_MEN }
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}
	}

	#Decision to escalate conflict further
	MAN_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_MEN = {

		icon = decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		visible = {
			has_border_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 880
				state = 611
			}
		}

		cost = 200
		
		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				set_border_war_data = {
					attacker = 880
					defender = 611
					defender_modifier = 0.15
					combat_width = 100
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_border_war_data = {
					attacker = 880
					defender = 611
					attacker_modifier = 0.15
					combat_width = 100
				}
			}
			MEN = {
				set_country_flag = {
					flag = WTT_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_cooldown_@ROOT
					days = 60
					value = 1
				}
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = MAN decision = MAN_border_conflict_escalate_conflict_MEN }
			}
			set_country_flag = {
				flag = WTT_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_cooldown_@MEN
				days = 60
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = in_60_days
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = MEN decision = MAN_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_MEN }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}
	}

	#Decision to escalate conflict further
	MAN_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_MEN = {

		icon = decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		visible = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = WTT_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_cooldown_@FROM }
			has_border_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 880
				state = 611
			}
		}

		cost = 150

		days_remove = 15

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		war_with_target_on_remove = yes

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				880 = { save_event_target_as = their_state }
				611 = { save_event_target_as = our_state }
			}
			else = {
				880 = { save_event_target_as = our_state }
				611 = { save_event_target_as = their_state }
			}
			MEN = {
				country_event = { id = japan_border_conflict.5 }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_targeted_decision = { target = MAN decision = MAN_border_conflict_escalate_to_war_MEN }
				}
		 	}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			cancel_border_war = {
				dont_fire_events = yes
				defender = 611
				attacker = 880
			}
			declare_war_on = { target = FROM type = annex_everything }
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				611 = {
					clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
				}
				880 = {
					clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
				}
				
			}
			else = {
				FROM = {
					611 = {
						clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
					}
					880 = {
						clr_state_flag = border_incident_active
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}
	}

	#Decision to back down from conflict
	MAN_border_conflict_back_out_of_conflict_MEN = {

		allowed = { always = no } #Activated from effect

		visible = {
			has_border_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			OR = {
				state = 880
				state = 611
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes #Reactivation handled in effect

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_border_conflict_defender_vs_FROM = yes }
				finalize_border_war = {
					attacker_win = yes
					attacker = 880
					defender = 611
				}
			}
			else = {
				finalize_border_war = {
					attacker = 880
					defender = 611
					defender_win = yes
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				
			}
		}
	}

	##### USA
	COM_is_USA_pressure_CAN_dec = {

		icon = generic_civil_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = USA
		}
		
		visible = {
			has_idea = USA_ENG_betrayal_I
		}
		
		available = {
			has_idea = USA_ENG_betrayal_I
		
			CAN = {
				OR = {
					has_government = fascism
					has_government = communism
					
					is_in_faction_with = GER
					is_subject_of = GER
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 150

		complete_effect = {
			CAN = {
				country_event = umc_usa.10
			}
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = UMC_accept_demands_tt
			
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_political_power = 100
				add_stability = 0.015
				add_war_support = 0.025
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Man the Guns"
					}
					
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CAN
						autonomy_state = autonomy_supervised_state
					}
				}
				else = {
					puppet = CAN
				}
				
				CAN = {
					add_political_power = -150
					add_stability = 0.025
					add_war_support = 0.005
				
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								332 = { is_owned_by = ENG }
								332 = { is_owned_by = USA }
							}
						}
						
						transfer_state = 332
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								331 = { is_owned_by = ENG }
								331 = { is_owned_by = USA }
							}
						}
						
						transfer_state = 331
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
